issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product
resolution.name: Not Our Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*NOTE: This issue is not a titanium issue & most probably an android SDK 24.4 tools issue. Reverting to android SDK tools 23.3.4 this issue is not seen*

h5.Description:
1. Make sure you have android SDK tools 24.4 installed.
2. Build any app from appcelerator studio to android emulator or launch an emulator from avd manager.

h5. Actual Results:
1. The icons etc in the emulator appears to be enlarged or probably the resolution seems to be low(that's why it looks enlarged).
2. Tried to play with different skins in the avd manager but for some skins the emulator takes forever to boot.
3. Tried with 5.1.1 & 6.0.0 emulators.
NOTE : Refer the attached screenshot for reference.
fields.summary: Android: Icons etc look enlarged on android emulator when SDK tools 24.4 are installed

comments.body: Closing per developer comments. Google emulator issues and not our issue.
